properties.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
properties.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 25 at 2:57AM AKST until January 26 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Very cold wind chills to 45 below occuring. The cold
wind chills will cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to
exposed skin.

* WHERE...Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills near Shaktoolik.

* WHEN...Now to 6 PM Sunday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Shaktoolik has the strongest winds and
cold wind chills. Other locations are much less windy with
less severe wind chills.
properties.instruction:
A Wind Chill Advisory means that cold air and sustained wind
speeds of 15 mph or more will create low wind chills. Frost bite
and hypothermia can occur if precautions are not taken.

NWSheadline: WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST SUNDAY
